content:
How to Secure TikTok Paid Partnerships in 2025: A Creator’s Guide

In 2025, TikTok paid partnerships are a top income source for creators, with micro-influencers (10K–50K followers) earning $100–$1,500 per post due to their 17.9% engagement rates (HypeAuditor, 2024). This guide dives into practical strategies and tools like Newcollab to help you secure brand deals.

Secure TikTok Partnerships with Newcollab

Pitch brands directly and get paid fast with Newcollab’s tools.

Join Now

Understanding TikTok Paid Partnerships

A paid partnership is a paid collaboration where creators promote a brand’s products or services in TikTok videos, disclosed with #ad or #sponsored for FTC compliance. These deals leverage TikTok’s algorithm, which favors authentic content, making micro-influencers prime candidates for brands.

A Creator’s Journey to Paid Partnerships

Meet Sarah, a 20K-follower TikTok creator who landed a $700 deal with Glossier. Her strategy? Combining algorithm-friendly content with platforms like Newcollab. Here’s how you can follow her path.

‘Newcollab made pitching brands so easy—I went from zero to $700 in a month!’

- Sarah K., Beauty Creator

Strategies to Secure Paid Partnerships

1. Leverage TikTok’s Algorithm

TikTok’s For You Page (FYP) algorithm prioritizes videos with high watch time and engagement.

  • Hook Early: Grab attention in the first 3 seconds with bold visuals or questions.
  • Trending Sounds: Use popular audio to boost visibility.
  • Post Consistently: Aim for 3–5 videos per week to stay relevant.

2. Build a Standout Media Kit

Your media kit is your pitch to brands. Include:

  • Stats: Follower count, engagement rate (10%+ is ideal), and top-performing videos.
  • Niche: Highlight your focus (e.g., fashion, fitness).
  • Past Work: Showcase previous collabs or high-performing posts.

Tip: Use Canva to create a professional PDF media kit.

3. Join Newcollab for Direct Brand Access

Newcollab connects you with over 1,000 brands seeking TikTok creators.

  • Ad Slots: List your rates ($10–$30 per 1K followers).
  • Dashboard: Manage brand offers and track campaigns.
  • Payments: Secure payouts via Stripe Connect.

Newcollab eliminates the hassle of cold emailing.

4. Engage with TikTok Creator Marketplace

TikTok’s Creator Marketplace is a built-in platform for brand deals, but requires 10K+ followers and active posting.

  • Apply: Enable the Creator Marketplace in TikTok settings.
  • Showcase: Highlight engagement metrics to attract brands.

5. Network with Brands on Social Media

Engage with brands directly on TikTok or X.

  • Comment: Interact with brand posts to get noticed.
  • Tag: Create unsolicited content featuring their products.

Maximizing Partnership Success

To stand out:

  • Authenticity: Promote products you genuinely use.
  • Storytelling: Weave brand messages into relatable narratives.
  • Analytics: Share TikTok Insights with brands to prove ROI.

Why Newcollab Stands Out

Newcollab offers:

  • Brand Network: Access brands like Glossier and Adidas.
  • Streamlined Process: Bid, negotiate, and sign contracts in one platform.
  • Reliable Payments: Get paid quickly and securely.

Join Newcollab discover creators before signing up. to accelerate your partnerships.

Avoiding Common Pitfalls

Don’t:

  • Undervalue Yourself: Avoid deals below your worth ($100+ for 10K followers).
  • Ignore FTC Rules: Always use #ad or #sponsored.
  • Overpromise: Only accept campaigns you can deliver.

Conclusion

Securing TikTok paid partnerships in 2025 is within reach with the right tools and strategies. Use Newcollab to connect with brands, pitch confidently, and earn $100–$1,500 per post. Start building your TikTok empire today.
